I have built TopTargetCrypto, which is a dynamic website for a group of enthusiastic of crypto related matters.
I have used Django at the backend with help of bootstrap for the frontend. The authors publish a much detailed blog post from the rich featured Django admin template when visitors can register themselves and post comments on any post.
Features such as blog list view with date of post, tag, by author and numbers on total comments. And category, tags and search.
